testsgen.ifc
Interface LogIfc

All Known Implementing Classes:
LogImpl, LogImpl
public interface LogIfc

LogIfc.java contains definition for loging system. All generated messages should be displayed through the implementation of this interface. It concerns both user messages and debug messages.

Created: Sun Dec 2 15:21:57 2001

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
Artur Hefczyc
